Description: Both the AI Agent Project and the Customer Data Management System (CDMS) face threats related to unauthorized access and data interception.
The AI Agent Project shares mitigation strategies with the Payment Processing System (PPS) regarding API abuse and insufficient logging.
The attack patterns related to data tampering and elevation of privilege are common across the AI Agent Project and the Internal Communication Platform (ICP).

Source: Frequent occurrences of unauthorized access attempts across multiple systems indicate a systemic vulnerability.
Common vulnerabilities in data transmission protocols lead to high risks of data interception.
